Detector.Details: This detector warns about Coupling between one Class and another Classes. It is a fast detector.

BugPattern.LongDescription: Found Class Coupling(Class from another) in {1} {2} {3}
BugPattern.Details:
Decoupling One Class From Another

For more information on this see Sun Bug #6231579 and Sun Bug #6178997.

MessageCollection.BugCode: Decoupling One Class From Another Classes
